sentences.sentence: Law-school debt means that they have to work fearsomely hard.
sentences.translation: 法学院学生的债务意味着他们不得不非常努力地工作。

sentences.sentence: I don’t think that even their most enthusiastic fans could have predicted how fearsomely good this album would be.
sentences.translation: 即便是他们最狂热的粉丝也肯定不曾料到这张专辑会好得如此令人害怕。

sentences.sentence: Second Corinthians 11:14 tells us that our enemy even masquerades as an angel of light. And he is fearsomely powerful.
sentences.translation: 哥林多后书11：14告诉我们，敌人有时甚至化装成光明的天使，它是非常有能力的。
